Events
Dwarven Manufacture is using a very popular and proven event engine.
There are two types of events; automated and mini events.
Automated events run every 2 hours and players can join by using
.join/.leave commands or by registering with the Event NPC in Giran. Automated events
are Team vs Team (TVT), DeathMatch (DM), Capture The Flag (CTF)
Zombie, Mutant, Last Man Standing and many more!
Each event is secured from boting; dual boxing is strictly forbidden!
Participating is always rewarded, whether you lose or win!
Remember, mobs can wait! A good Dwarf loves events!
DWARVEN MANUFACTURE - COMMUNITY BOARD
